column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Iroh says : " If the city is as magnificent as its wall , Ba Sing Se must be something to behold .
#Text=" Ursa says : " For Zuko , a pearl dagger from the general who surrendered when we broke through the Outer Wall .
#Text=Note the inscription and the superior craftsmanship .
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " Never give up without a fight .
#Text=" Ursa says : " And for Azula , a new friend .
#Text=She wears the latest fashion for Earth Kingdom girls .
#Text=" Young Azula says : " If Uncle does n't make it back from war , then Dad will be next in line for Fire Lord , would n't he ?
#Text=" Ursa says : " Azula , we do n't speak that way .
#Text=It would be awful if Uncle Iroh did n't return .
#Text=And besides , Fire Lord Azulon is a picture of health .
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " How would you like it if cousin Lu Ten wanted Dad to die ?
#Text=" Young Azula says : " I still think our dad would make a much better Fire Lord than His Royal Tea - Loving Kookiness .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 're holding them wrong .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Keep in mind , these are dual swords .
#Text=Two halves of a single weapon .
#Text=Do n't think of them as separate , 'cause they 're not .
#Text=They 're just two different parts of the same whole .
#Text=" Lee says : " I think you 'd really like my brother Sensu .
#Text=He used to show me stuff like this all the time .
#Text=" Sela says : " Here .
#Text=This ought to get you through a few meals .
#Text=" Gansu says : " What do you think they want ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Trouble .
#Text=" Gansu says : " What do you want , Gow ?
#Text=" Gow says : " Just thought someone ought to tell you that your son 's battalion got captured .
#Text=You boys hear what the Fire Nation did with their last group of Earth Kingdom prisoners ?
#Text=" Earth Kingdom soldier says : " Dressed 'em up in Fire Nation uniforms and put 'em on the front line unarmed , the way I heard it .
#Text=Then they just watched .
#Text=" Gansu says : " You watch your mouth !
#Text=" Gow says : " Why bother rooting around in the mud with these pigs ?
#Text=" Ursa says : " Iroh has lost his son .
#Text=Your cousin Lu Ten did not survive the battle .
#Text=" Lee says : " What 's going to happen to my brother ?
#Text=" Gansu says : " I 'm going to the front .
#Text=I 'm going to find Sensu and bring him back .
#Text=" Lee says : " When my dad goes ... will you stay ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " No .
#Text=I need to move on .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Here .
#Text=I want you to have this .
#Text=Read the inscription .
#Text=" Lee says : " Made in Earth Kingdom .
#Text=" Zuko says : " The other one .
#Text=" Lee says : " Never give up without a fight .
#Text=" Young Azula says : " You waste all your time playing with knives .
#Text=You 're not even good !
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " Put an apple on your head and we 'll find out how good I am !
#Text=" Young Azula says : " By the way , Uncle 's coming home .
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " Does that mean ... we won the War ?
#Text=" Young Azula says : " No , it means Uncle 's a quitter and a loser .
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=Uncle 's not a quitter !
#Text=" Young Azula says : " Oh yes he is !
#Text=He found out his son died and he just fell apart !
#Text=A real general would stay and burn Ba Sing Se to the ground , not lose the battle and come home crying .
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " How do you know what he should do ?
#Text=He 's probably just sad his only kid is gone .
#Text=Forever .
#Text=" Ursa says : " Your father has requested an audience with Fire Lord Azulon .
#Text=Best clothes , hurry up !
#Text=" Young Azula says : " Fire Lord Azulon ... ca n't you just call him ' Grandfather ' ?
#Text=He 's not exactly the powerful Fire Lord he used to be .
#Text=Someone will probably end up taking his place soon .
#Text=" Ursa says : " Young lady !
#Text=Not another word !
#Text=" Ursa says : " What is wrong with that child ?
#Text="
